duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing design and installation for complex equipment upgrade projects in power plants and medium/high voltage substations.
Developing DC schematic drawings, AC elementary drawings, physical drawings, bill of materials, and relay settings.
Developing and reviewing wiring diagrams, cable/conduit schedules, and front panel layouts.
Developing control system architecture, points list, PLC ladder logic, and HMI screen configurations.
Assisting with the development of LOTO requirements and project schedules.
Supporting electricians during installs, performing functional testing and startup checks.
Attending design review meetings and making project redlines.
